==Abilities==
''Ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Stab
|desc_1 = Performs a quick stab with their [[Halberd]], dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2 = Swing
|desc_2 = Performs an sideway swing with their Halberd, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3 = 3-Stab Combo
|desc_3 = Performs 3 quick stabs with their Halberd, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} with each stab. This attack is only used as an occasional follow-up to '''Dodge'''.

|name_4 = Lithic Triad
|desc_4 = Winds up and performs 3 slashes with the axe blade of their Halberd, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} with each slash.

|name_5 = Dodge
|desc_5 = Jumps backwards away from the player.

|name_6 = Rally
|desc_6 = The Millelith Sergeant rallies nearby [[Millelith Soldier]]s, causing them to perform '''3-Stab Combo'''.
* '''Taunt''': If there are no Millelith Soldiers actively present, the Millelith Sergeant will do one of two taunting gestures. Leaving him vulnerable for a brief moment.
|caption_6 = Taunt Version 1
|file_6_2 = Millelith Sergeant Rally 2
|caption_6_2 = Taunt Version 2
}}
